available_messages.name: Engine speed
available_messages.purpose: RPM data sent by ECM

available_messages.name: Engine temperature
available_messages.purpose: Engine coolant temperature sent by ECM

available_messages.name: Throttle position
available_messages.purpose: Current throttle position sent by ECM

available_messages.name: Engine load
available_messages.purpose: Indicates the engine load percentage sent by ECM

available_messages.name: Gear position
available_messages.purpose: Current gear position sent by TCM

available_messages.name: Transmission temperature
available_messages.purpose: Temperature of the transmission system sent by TCM

available_messages.name: Clutch status
available_messages.purpose: Status of the clutch (engaged/disengaged) sent by TCM

available_messages.name: Transmission mode
available_messages.purpose: Current transmission mode sent by TCM

available_messages.name: Brake pressure
available_messages.purpose: Brake system pressure sent by ABS

available_messages.name: Wheel speed
available_messages.purpose: Individual wheel speed sent by ABS

available_messages.name: ABS status
available_messages.purpose: Indicates if ABS is active or inactive

available_messages.name: ABS on
available_messages.purpose: Turns on the ABS

available_messages.name: ABS off
available_messages.purpose: Turns off the ABS

available_messages.name: Stability control status
available_messages.purpose: Indicates if ESP is active or disabled

available_messages.name: Yaw rate
available_messages.purpose: Vehicle yaw rate data sent by ESP

available_messages.name: Traction control status
available_messages.purpose: Status of traction control system sent by ESP

available_messages.name: ESP on
available_messages.purpose: Turns on the ESP

available_messages.name: ESP off
available_messages.purpose: Turns off the ESP

available_messages.name: Window position
available_messages.purpose: Current window position sent by BCM

available_messages.name: Exterior light status
available_messages.purpose: Indicates if headlights or indicators are on

available_messages.name: Lights on
available_messages.purpose: Turns on the lights

available_messages.name: Lights off
available_messages.purpose: Turns off the lights

available_messages.name: Toggle lights mode
available_messages.purpose: Switches between short phase and long phase

available_messages.name: Climate control temperature
available_messages.purpose: Target cabin temperature sent by CCM

available_messages.name: Fan speed
available_messages.purpose: Fan speed for HVAC processed by CCM

available_messages.name: Airflow direction
available_messages.purpose: Indicates airflow direction sent by CCM

available_messages.name: Air conditioning status
available_messages.purpose: On/Off status of air conditioning system

available_messages.name: Parking distance warning
available_messages.purpose: Distance to obstacles sent by PDC

available_messages.name: Proximity alert
available_messages.purpose: Alert for objects nearby processed by PDC

available_messages.name: Reverse gear status
available_messages.purpose: Indicates if reverse gear is engaged sent by PDC

available_messages.name: Obstacle distance
available_messages.purpose: Exact distance to the closest obstacle sent by PDC

available_messages.name: Media track info
available_messages.purpose: Current media track details sent by IVI

available_messages.name: Navigation directions
available_messages.purpose: Turn-by-turn navigation instructions sent by IVI

available_messages.name: System error message
available_messages.purpose: General error messages sent by IVI or multiple ECUs

available_messages.name: Fuel level
available_messages.purpose: Current fuel level percentage processed by IVI or BCM

available_messages.name: Battery voltage
available_messages.purpose: Current vehicle battery voltage sent by BCM or PCM

available_messages.name: Cruise control status
available_messages.purpose: Status of cruise control system sent by PCM or ECM

available_messages.name: Collision warning
available_messages.purpose: Indicates a potential collision sent by ESP or PDC

available_messages.name: Lane departure warning
available_messages.purpose: Alerts if vehicle is leaving its lane sent by ESP

available_messages.name: Adaptive cruise control setpoint
available_messages.purpose: Target distance for adaptive cruise control sent by PCM

available_messages.name: Diagnostic read request
available_messages.purpose: Request to read diagnostic parameters

available_messages.name: Diagnostic read response
available_messages.purpose: Response containing requested diagnostic data

available_messages.name: Configuration write request
available_messages.purpose: Request to configure an ECU parameter

available_messages.name: Configuration write response
available_messages.purpose: Acknowledgment of a successful configuration
